posts.caption: In The Holdouts, you'll embark on a session-based shooter adventure where you'll fight to survive in a warped new reality. Armed with an arsenal of unhinged and deadly weapons, you'll smash, grab, and grow in a world that's full of surprises. From lawn tools to kitchen appliances, get ready to turn everyday objects into your most trusted companions in this indie gem.

Join us at Playtopia and step into our unique hand-drawn indie game. Get an exclusive look at the game development process and experience the excitement of being inside the game. Our team's 11-year journey comes alive in this unforgettable experience.

Discover the thrilling experience of IRL Inscryption, a card game that's pushing the boundaries of gaming. With its unique blend of strategy and social interaction, this game is a must-play for anyone looking for a new challenge. In this video, we're diving into the world of IRL Inscryption and showing you what makes it so compelling. From the intricate gameplay mechanics to the immersive atmosphere, we're breaking it all down and sharing our expert insights.
